description: Papaya Studio was a video game developer that was active from 2000 to 2013. The company developed video games such as VeggieTales LarryBoy and the Bad Apple and Disney Princess: Enchanted Journey.

Both those games, and others developed by Papaya Studio, store their credits in CRE files. These files are normal plain text files, renamed to use the .cre extension. The special extension denotes that the file contains the game's credits.

common_filenames.description: Credits.cre - The default name for Papaya Studio CRE files.
